mapper.select: SELECT seat_address AS seatAddress FROM mooc_field_t f, mooc_hall_dict_t d WHERE f.`hall_id` = d.`UUID` AND f.`UUID` = #{fieldId}

SELECT o.`UUID` AS orderId, o.`film_name` AS filmName, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.`film_start_time`,'%y年%m月%d日'),' ',DATE_FORMAT(o.`film_start_time`,'%H时%i分%s秒')) AS fieldTime, o.`cinema_name` AS cinemaName, o.`seats_name` AS seatsName, o.`order_price` AS orderPrice, o.order_status as orderStatus, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.`order_time`) AS orderTimestamp FROM mooc_order_t o WHERE 1=1 AND o.`UUID` = #{orderId}

SELECT o.`UUID` AS orderId, o.`film_name` AS filmName, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.`film_start_time`,'%y年%m月%d日'),' ',DATE_FORMAT(o.`film_start_time`,'%H时%i分%s秒')) AS fieldTime, o.`cinema_name` AS cinemaName, o.`seats_name` AS seatsName, o.`order_price` AS orderPrice, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.`order_time`) AS orderTimestamp FROM mooc_order_t o WHERE 1=1 AND o.`order_user` = #{userId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(seats_ids) FROM mooc_order_t where field_id=#{fieldId}
